statements: UPDATE quantum_circuit_configurations SET qubit_count = 5, gate_operations = '{"H": 2, "X": 1}' WHERE id = 'dc69f4f2-0131-4199-8470-42ef8724f285';

UPDATE quantum_circuit_configurations SET gate_operations = '{"Hadamard": 1, "CNOT": 1}' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE QuantumCircuits SET gates_count = 10, qubits_count = 5 WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE ErrorCorrectionCodes SET redundancy_factor = 3, code_length = 8 WHERE code_id = 2;
UPDATE QuantumCircuits SET circuit_name = 'Grover Circuit', qubits_count = 4 WHERE circuit_id = 1;

UPDATE Errors SET error_probability = 0.05, error_description = 'Bit-flip Error' WHERE error_id = 2;
UPDATE QuantumCircuits SET qubit_count = 3 WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE ErrorRecords SET error_timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:20:00' WHERE record_id = 3;
